CustomField.description: Check box is checked if one of the Constituent type selected is either: Staff Full-time (or) Staff Part-time (or) Faculty Full-time (or) Faculty Part-time
CustomField.formula: INCLUDES( ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c , "Staff Full-time") || INCLUDES( ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c , "Staff Part-time") || INCLUDES( ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c , "Faculty Full-time") || INCLUDES( ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c , "Faculty Part-time")
CustomField.label: Is School Employee
